name: Waterpark Simulator
description:
Too lazy to go to a waterpark? Can't exit home due to quarantine? Suffer no more! Here comes a Waterpark Simulator!

Waterpark Simulator is a funny game with some interesting gameplay, good graphics and immersive first person animations. Enjoy all typical waterpark amusmenets. Use glides, get drunk, sunbath, swim in a pool, eat different types of food, socialize... Thanks to this game, your summer will be as if the corona never happened!


Features:

-Use glides in first person perspective
-Swim
-Customize your character: choose sex, haircut, clothing, etc
-Get drunk
-Good graphics
-VR-support
-Achievements
-Controller support
